PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-10802016-12-02HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (Nutrition Labelling, Other Labelling Provisions and Food Colours)
PrecisRegulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS – NUTRITION LABELLING, OTHER LABELLING PROVISIONS AND FOOD COLOURS in order to make the information in labels on prepackaged products more useful and easier to read and based on the latest science, so that Canadians are better able to maintain or improve their health.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0305 Publication Date: 2016-12-14
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Food and Drug Regulations (Nutrition Labelling, Other Labelling Provisions and Food Colours)
precis: Regulations Amending the FOOD AND DRUG REGULATIONS – NUTRITION LABELLING, OTHER LABELLING PROVISIONS AND FOOD COLOURS in order to make the information in labels on prepackaged products more useful and easier to read and based on the latest science, so that Canadians are better able to maintain or improve their health.
